mapping.name: ${province_en}_QOE_TEMPLETBASE_%%Y%%M%%D.csv
mapping.templet: 电信四期_扇区QOE模板基本信息_LTE.ftl
mapping.sql: SELECT '1.42.02b_SP0' "版本号", '%%Y-%%M-%%D' "时间戳", '${province_cn}' "省份", et.template_name "模板名称", decode(et.generation_type,1,1,4,2) "网络类型", decode(af.businesstype,'1X',1,'DO',2,'FDD',3,'TDD',4) "系统类型", '各维度得分*维度权重之和，通过分值的区间分别计算QOE的得分' "综合得分规则", '维度下各指标*指标加权值之和' "覆盖类得分规则", sum(decode(ei.seqno,1,ei.eval_rate*ef.field_rate/100,0))/100 "覆盖类得分权重", '维度下各指标*指标加权值之和' "接入类得分规则", sum(decode(ei.seqno,2,ei.eval_rate*ef.field_rate/100,0))/100 "接入类得分权重", '维度下各指标*指标加权值之和' "保持类得分规则", sum(decode(ei.seqno,3,ei.eval_rate*ef.field_rate/100,0))/100 "保持类得分权重", '维度下各指标*指标加权值之和' "业务完整性得分规则", sum(decode(ei.seqno,4,ei.eval_rate*ef.field_rate/100,0))/100 "业务完整性得分权重", '维度下各指标*指标加权值之和' "网络可用性得分规则", sum(decode(ei.seqno,5,ei.eval_rate*ef.field_rate/100,0))/100 "网络可用性得分权重" FROM (select t.template_id,t.template_name,t.generation_type from cfg_qoe_eval_temlate t where t.sharetype=1) et left join cfg_qoe_eval_item ei on et.template_id= ei.template_id left join cfg_qoe_eval_field ef on ei.template_id= ef.template_id and ei.eval_id= ef.eval_id left join DS_CFG_APP_FORMULA af on ef.att_id=af.id group by et.template_name,decode(et.generation_type,1,1,4,2),decode(af.businesstype,'1X',1,'DO',2,'FDD',3,'TDD',4)

mapping.name: ${province_en}_QOE_TEMPLETINDEX_%%Y%%M%%D.csv
mapping.templet: 电信四期_扇区QOE模板指标内容_LTE.ftl
mapping.sql: SELECT '1.42.02b_SP0' "版本号", '%%Y-%%M-%%D' "时间戳", '${province_cn}' "省份", et.template_name "模板名称", ei.seqno "指标维度", ef.field_name "指标名称", ef.att_id "指标编号", af.formula "指标定义", '3' "指标时间粒度", efc.dfgz "指标得分规则", ef.field_rate "指标得分权重" FROM (select t.template_id, t.template_name, t.generation_type from cfg_qoe_eval_temlate t where t.sharetype = 1) et left join cfg_qoe_eval_item ei on et.template_id = ei.template_id left join cfg_qoe_eval_field ef on ei.template_id = ef.template_id and ei.eval_id = ef.eval_id left join DS_CFG_APP_FORMULA af on ef.att_id = af.id left join (select t.template_id, t.eval_id, t.field_id, wmsys.wm_concat(decode(t.min_value_sign, 0, '(', 1, '[') || t.min_value || '~' || t.max_value || decode(t.max_value_sign, 0, ')', 1, ']') || ':' || t.field_score) dfgz from CFG_QOE_EVAL_FIELD_SECTION t group by t.template_id, t.eval_id, t.field_id) efc on ef.field_id = efc.field_id and ef.eval_id = efc.eval_id and ef.template_id = efc.template_id
